mapper.select: SELECT Id, `Name`, CategoryId, Price, CreateTime, Summary, Total FROM Commodity WHERE IsActive = 1 AND (`Name` LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR Summary LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%") ORDER BY CreateTime DESC Limit #{start}, #{limit}

SELECT t1.Id, t1.`Name`, t1.CategoryId, t1.Price, t1.CreateTime, t1.Summary, t1.Total, t2.name AS tagName FROM Commodity t1 LEFT JOIN DictionaryEntry t2 ON t2.id = t1.tag WHERE t1.IsActive = 1 ORDER BY t1.CreateTime DESC Limit #{start}, #{limit}
SELECT Id, `Name`, CategoryId, Price, CreateTime, Summary, Total, Content FROM Commodity WHERE IsActive = 1 AND id = #{id} Limit 1
SELECT * FROM DictionaryEntry WHERE info = "1" AND dictionaryId = ( SELECT id FROM Dictionary WHERE code = "commodity_category" ) Limit 1
SELECT id, commodityId, image FROM CommodityImage WHERE isActive = 1 AND commodityId = #{commodityId} ORDER BY createTime ASC Limit 1
SELECT id, commodityId, image FROM CommodityImage WHERE isActive = 1 AND commodityId = #{commodityId} ORDER BY createTime ASC

SELECT t1.commodityId, t1.specEntryId, t2.name AS specEntryName, t3.name AS specName, t3.id AS specId FROM CommoditySpec t1 LEFT JOIN SpecEntry t2 ON t2.id = t1.specEntryId LEFT JOIN Spec t3 ON t3.id = t2.specId WHERE t1.commodityId = #{cid}
